body.name: Certified Refurbished Ring Floodlight Cam Wired Pro with Bird’s Eye View and 3D Motion Detection (2021 release), White
features: A Certified Refurbished Ring Floodlight Cam Wired Pro is refurbished, tested, and certified to look and work like new and comes with the same limited warranty as a new device. Certified Refurbished Amazon devices may be packaged in generic Amazon-branded boxes.
1080p HD security camera with motion-activated LED floodlights, Two-Way Talk and Audio+, 3D Motion Detection, HDR, and a built-in 110 dB security siren
Upgraded with advanced security features like improved noise reduction and Bird’s Eye View, a way to monitor motion events from above in the Ring app
Pinpoint motion with 3D Motion Detection to get accurate real-time alerts in the Ring app
Enjoy a reliable connection with dual-band (2.4 or 5.0 GHz) wifi connectivity
Easily hardwire to the outside of your home and connect to wifi for around-the-clock power and peace of mind
With a Ring Protect Plan (subscription sold separately), record all your videos, review what you missed for up to 60 days, and share videos and photos
For added peace of mind, pair with Alexa to help you keep an eye on your home

productInformation.name: Video
productInformation.value: 1080p HD, HDR, Live View, Color Night Vision.

productInformation.name: Motion Detection
productInformation.value: 3D Motion Detection with Bird’s Eye View; 270 degree, 30-foot Customizable Motion Zones.

productInformation.name: Audio
productInformation.value: Two-Way Talk with Audio+ and advanced noise cancellation.

productInformation.name: Siren
productInformation.value: Remote-activated 110db siren (level measured at 4 inch/10cm distance).

productInformation.name: Internet Requirements
productInformation.value: Recommended minimum upload speed of 2 Mbps per device.

productInformation.name: Connectivity
productInformation.value: 802.11 b/g/n/ac Wi-Fi connection @2.4GHz and 5.0GHz 902-928 Mhz Radio

productInformation.name: Dimensions
productInformation.value: 12.82 in x 7.77 in x 8.5 in (32.6 cm. x 19.75 cm. x 21.7 cm.) Base/Mounting Bracket: 4.70-inch (12cm) diameter.

productInformation.name: Setup Requirements
productInformation.value: Floodlight Fixture: Integrated and Adjustable Floodlight. Product can be mounted on a Wall or Ceiling.

productInformation.name: Warranty and Service
productInformation.value: 1-year limited warranty. This device receives the same limited warranty as a new device. Learn more about Certified Refurbished Amazon devices. Use and purchase of Floodlight Cam Wired Pro is subject to the terms found here.

productInformation.name: Support
productInformation.value: Click here to view more information on the Floodlight Cam Wired Pro support page.

productInformation.name: Software Security Updates
productInformation.value: This device receives guaranteed software security updates until at least four years after the device is last available for purchase as a new unit on our websites. Learn more about these software security updates. If you already own a Ring device, visit Software Security Updates in Ring Control Center for information specific to your device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything ok so fae
reviews.reviewText: Ive only used it for one day. Tried all the features all works great. Customer service did a good job setting me up on the year plan to coexist with my other ring devices. I am actually impressed with the quality of the lighting and the video. I know theyre due to come out with a new version so paying full price wasnt a viable option. This said the device is super amazing it covers the whole front side of my house clearly. Being able to dim the lights is so awesome because im not trying to be an annoying neighbor. Like others say the motion is very senative so the lowest level of that works great for me. The video recording really is impressively clear and the birds eye draws out a precise map of where people walked. Its kinda freaky and almost creepy how high tech that feature is

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great picture quality easy install no learning curve for my inlaws
reviews.reviewText: With the wall install kit, I was able to install this camera for my inlaws in a little over an hour. I had installed a ring doorbell at their house previously and now my mother in law expressed the desire to see in front of their house as well. There was no electrical box on the front so I bought the wall mount kit with this unit and was able to simply drill a hole and run the wire along the garage ceiling and plug it in where the garage door plugs in. Fantastic picture quality and the phone interface was familiar to them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ring Make Good Products
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this item earlier in the year and we like it very much. The only thing we did not like was that it took us some time to install, between bad weather, vacations and simply lack of time, the "free" trial period lapsed based on purchase date, not on an installation date. They can tell when this connected to an account and a wi-fi; same way they know when your item is offline.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this refurbished Ring since it was cheaper. It works just as good I would expect from any Ring branded light. I had no issues getting it installed and it works perfectly. Would buy again if I needed another Ring floodlight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dissatisfied, but good recovery
reviews.reviewText: This is more a critique of the refurbish program than the product itself since I am unable to complete the install because of a required PIN number that’s definitely missing from anywhere in or on the factory box. The process came to a hard stop and after 30 mins troubleshooting with tech support, I’m left with nothing but a hole in my wall where the original fixture used to be, at least for the next 3 days until the replacement arrives.Disappointed because there are a number of reported issues surrounding the readiness of these refurb products…installers not able to complete the software portion of the install for various proof of purchase or security issues. I imagined it would be easier to reset software/QR codes and serial numbers, than it is to refresh hardware and packaging, but the former is apparently more challenging.Ring needs to improve quality control if they’re hoping for a successful refurb program. The discount being applied and the resulting cost of recovery and/or replacement does not sound like success. 4 stars and not less because this is my 3rd Ring product and 2nd refurb but first time having an issue. The products are intuitive, love the alert response time, and appreciate the software that ties them all together. I intend to keep growing my Ring ecosystem.Update: The replacement arrived and installed without issues. Strangely the QR code did have a pin at the bottom this time (missing on the refurb) but it wasn’t required during installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product and warranty. We’ve operated a remote surveillance company for more than 20 years from large oil & gas operations to small car dealers to schools, financial institutions to government facilities. Ring products can hold its own with all the major competitors in the non commercial industries. Warrant, Support, and Quality is key and Ring checks all the boxes. If your not needing 4k or higher resolution for large commercial jobs Ring is the right option heck even commercial jobs can benefit from Ring products as well. Game changer for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strongly Recommend For Homes
reviews.reviewText: This is AWESOME. I'm already using Ring products for the front it was important for security to have a bright light for the backyard. I tried the cheap solar powered ones and they always seem to give out after a few months. The Ring ones last and outshine them in almost every aspect. The light is bright and easy to setup but I do strongly recommend making sure its anchored in properly in case of wind . The motion detection is great and pretty on point. Purchase the accessory if you don't want to deal with hard wiring. Excellent purchase and would easily recommend - I plan on getting another one for the side yard as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I get the annual plan as I have multiple devices, and I love these
reviews.reviewText: I get the annual plan as I have multiple devices, and I love these. Lets me keep an eye on my house when I am away as well as sharing with neighbors who watch each others houses when they are away. Ring support is also first notch if you have issues. Highly recoment this brand. It intergrates well into Alexa evviroment if you have any of the Show devices. I do not know if the same integration is availible with Goodle hub as I don't have that.
